title: opende - With solver type "world", contacts cause Gazebo (gzserver) to crash

content.raw:
In both builds for tag gazebo_1.3.1 and branch gazebo_pre_1.4, dropping a simple box to the ground causes Gazebo to crash.

First few times debugging the gazebo_1.3.1 gzserver binary with gdb, the debugger stops in deps/opende/src/joints/contact.cpp, dxJointContact::getInfo2(), which is called by dWorldStep(). No segfault dumps are shown.

Buf I've ran it a few more times, and now it's dying in gazebo/physics/World.cc:395, World::Step():

395	      this->simTime += this->physicsEngine->GetStepTime();

No segfault dumps are shown here. Not sure what the exact reason is.
